mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, articleId = #{articleId}, displayStatus = 1
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM reply AS R INNER JOIN member AS M ON R.memberId = M.id WHERE R.displayStatus = 1 AND R.articleId = #{id} ORDER BY R.id DESC
